name: Bloatfly Loaf
desc: Unlocks the recipe to craft Bloatfly Loaf, providing HP and increased Radiation Resistance.

desc: Unlocks the recipe to craft Bloodbug Peppersteak, which increases maximum HP for a duration.

name: Ground Molerat
desc: Unlocks the recipe to craft Ground Molerat, providing HP and a bonus to Agility.
